short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translate LaTeX text from clipboard to a calculator compatible format.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simplify Your Math Workflow!

Tired of retyping long mathematical formulas in LaTeX just to enter them into a calculator?

With LatexToCalc, effortlessly convert your LaTeX formulas into a calculator-friendly format—optimized for the TI-Nspire CAS CX.

Default Keybind: CTRL + SHIFT + Z

Easily translate the contents of your clipboard, selected text, or focused LaTeX formula—all with one simple keybind. For a tailored experience, customize your shortcut at chrome://extensions/.

Includes support for everything Finnish high school math has to offer!

Special support for sanomapro.fi and math-demo.abitti.fi

Tags: LaTeX to Calculator, LaTeX to Calc, TI-Nspire, Speedcrunch, KaTeX, TeX
